movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A mind-bending thriller about dreams within dreams.

movies.title: The Great Gatsby
movies.description: A mysterious millionaire throws lavish parties in 1920s New York.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space.

movies.title: Parasite
movies.description: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy household.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: A hacker discovers the reality he lives in is a simulation.

movies.title: La La Land
movies.description: A jazz musician and an aspiring actress fall in love in Los Angeles.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: Batman faces off against the Joker in a high-stakes battle for Gotham's soul.

movies.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
movies.description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max teams up with Furiosa to escape a tyrannical warlord.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men form a deep bond over years, finding redemption and friendship.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.description: A slow-witted but kind-hearted man experiences monumental events in history.

directors.name: Christopher Nolan
directors.biography: British-American director known for complex storytelling and visual innovation.

directors.name: Frank Darabont
directors.biography: American director best known for The Shawshank Redemption and The Green Mile.

directors.name: Baz Luhrmann
directors.biography: Australian director known for visually extravagant films like Moulin Rouge! and The Great Gatsby.

directors.name: Bong Joon-ho
directors.biography: South Korean filmmaker acclaimed for combining drama, social commentary, and thrills.

directors.name: The Wachowskis
directors.biography: Sibling duo behind groundbreaking sci-fi films including The Matrix trilogy.

directors.name: Damien Chazelle
directors.biography: American director known for musical dramas like Whiplash and La La Land.

directors.name: Robert Zemeckis
directors.biography: American director known for classics like Forrest Gump and Back to the Future.
